stimulation_side.Description: Side of tDCS stimulation (Left or Right hemisphere).

UCLA_R_screening.Description: UCLA Loneliness Scale (Revised) score obtained during screening, used to determine participant eligibility for the study.

UCLA_R.Description: UCLA Loneliness Scale (Revised) score, measuring perceived loneliness, administered during the experimental session.

SIAS.Description: Social Interaction Anxiety Scale score, measuring social interaction anxiety.

CESD.Description: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale score, measuring depressive symptoms.

ERQ_CR.Description: Emotion Regulation Questionnaire - Cognitive Reappraisal subscale score.

ERQ_ES.Description: Emotion Regulation Questionnaire - Expressive Suppression subscale score.

SNS.Description: Social Network Scale - measure of objective social isolation.

Gender.Description: Participant gender. Values: Female or Male.

Group.Description: Loneliness group assignment based on UCLA-R screening score. Values: Low Lonely or High Lonely.
